oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rock Across America - Detroit
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a segment of Rock Across America, Detroit addition, featuring Jerry House (announcer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Rock Across America jingle -- Opening statement (Jerry House) -- various listener call ins -- House introduces Huey Lewis and the News -- House introduces Lionel Richie -- House introduces the Supremes -- House introduces Phil Collins -- House introduces Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson
